Benthic sampling includes both clam and amphipod data that we're interested in.

Redoing benthic script with correct stations that were continuously monitored over the time series

Load packages

```{r, echo= FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
```

## Read in raw benthic count data

Exists locally, too big to go on GitHub, but can be found on KNB at https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/knb/d1/mn/v2/object/urn:uuid:25b7befd-e931-4a50-9bf6-14715561f64a

```{r}
ben_raw <- tryCatch(
  read_csv("data_raw/DWR Benthic raw count data 1975-2020 2021_10_01.csv"))
```
